name: Pixelmade Interactive
tagline: Vancouver Web Design + Internet Marketing Company
description:
Pixelmade is a Vancouver web design firm that offers all the services needed to build, maintain, and market websites. Our services are exclusively web-focused and cover 6 service areas: 5-step planning; web applications; web design; internet marketing; maintenance; and hosting.
Through a dedication to planning - "Plan to succeed online" - we have provided professional web designs that improve website results and reduce our client's costs.
